message:
[알림][오늘의영어]
오늘의 영어 공부 (2026-02-27)

[오늘의 단어]
- nest egg: 노후 자금
- severance: 단절
- severance pay: 퇴직금
- reassure: 완성시키다
- asset allocation: 자산 배분
- infestation: 우글거림
- congressional: 의회의
- nutritious: 양질의
- blurry: 흐릿한, 모호한
- proprietary: 독자적인, 소유자의

[오늘의 문장]
- I was not completely sure about it at first.
- I've learned the earlier you start, the better.
- We argue here and there.
- It is a bit of hassle to wash.
- My son is not very athletic.
